document.full_text: south korea's financial watchdog launched an investigation on monday into the leak of personal information from south korea's hyundai capital, the consumer finance unit of hyundai motor group, a financial supervisory service official said.
document.title: south korea watchdog probes hyundai capital data breach
lines_and_colors: south korea's financial watchdog launched an investigation on monday into the leak of personal information from south korea's hyundai capital, the consumer finance unit of hyundai motor group, a financial supervisory service official said.
